Course Name: ACG 2030C - CAPSTONE REVIEW COURSE OF ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES
Course Title: CAPSTONE REVIEW COURSE OF ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES
Statewide Course: CAPSTONE REVIEW COURSE OF ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES
Course Description: THIS COURSE GIVES STUDENTS THE OPPORTUNITY TO INTEGRATE KNOWLEDGE LEARNED FROM PRIOR ACCOUNTING, COMPUTER, AND COMMUNICATION COURSES THROUGH A VARIETY OF INDIVIDUAL AND GROUP LEARNING EXPERIENCES. DISCIPLINE SPECIFIC PROJECTS AND WORKPLACE SCENARIOS WILL BE USED TO DEMONSTRATE MASTERY OF REQUISITE PARAPROFESSIONAL SKILLS. THIS COURSE MUST BE TAKEN IN THE STUDENT'S FINAL SEMESTER OF STUDY.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
